position.marginalia_text: Qua[e] aute[m], quot, et qualia metallica et naturalia sunt, elementa, in Cabalisticum, archimica[e] artis magisteriu[m] ingredientia Quid etia[m] forma, materia, mediu[m] dispositiu[m], Aurum, Argentum splendidum, Argentum calcinatum, Argentum viuum, de corde Saturni, Oleum Sulphuris. Quidq[ue] sit Argilla simplex, haud nos fugit te ia[m] intellexisse, ac experentia in laboratorio n[ost]ro conspexisse, cum hac de re, verba (vt n[ost]ra exigit amicitia) haberemus. Attamen [etc]. vbi sequitur, de Metallorum spiritus generatione/ De Metalloru[m] anima[e] generatione/ De mixtione corporis, spiritusq[ue] Metalloru[m] Anima[e]./et in fine sequitur

marginalia.translation: What is also form, matter, assigned middle, gold, calcinated silver, quicksilver, of the heart of Saturn, oil of sulphur.

position.marginalia_text: Perficitur aute[m] diuinu[m] Arcanu[m] hoc equini fimi medio, qui est ignis (vt supra) per horas et per dies, sub NVTV ad fixu[m] libraru[m] LXIIII Hora[e] aute[m] et pariter Fimi dies, erunt ex temporibus NVTV: Gradibus huiusmodi in n[ost]ra Theorica no[n] expressis +++

marginalia.translation: But the divine arcane is completed by this middle of horse dung, which is fire (as above) through hours and days, under the will

underline.text: vbi sequitur, de Metallorum spiritus generatione/ De Mettaloru[m] animus generatione/ De mixtione[m] corporis, spiritusq[ue] Metalloru[m] Animus./et in fine sequitur/
